ee anuwa mema kalliya mita masa gananawakata pera lokaye ratawal gananawaka pihiti ee.ti.em. yanthra dahasakin paya kihipayak thula ekawara dolar miliyana 45ka mudalak paharagena atha.niwyok nagaraye pamanak pihiti ee.ti.em. telar yanthra 2400kin ek payak thula dolar miliyana dekayi dashama hatharaka (2.4) mudalak paharagena thibe.ee.ti.em. yanthra walin mudal pahara ganimata amatharawa wisa, debit, aadi kredit kad harahada wancha sidu karagena yayi.ema kad bhawitha karannange ananyatha thorathuru me kalliya magin sukshma lesa soyagena aththe antharjalaya siyum upakrama haraha bhawitha karamin bawa ema jathyanthara buddhi ansha penwa di atha.me kalliya sidu kala sayibar aparadha atharin prabalama ekak wenne oomanhi maskat bankuwen nikuth kala ginum anka 12ka thorathuru labagena paswaru 3.00 wana wita ganudenu thishaya dahasakin dolar miliyana 40k pahara ganime siddhiyayi.me aparadha kalliyata ee.ti.em. yanthrawalin dolar miliyana gananak ekawara pahara ganimata hakiwi thibenne lokaye boho ratawal wala ee.ti.em. yanthrawalin ekwarakata dolar miliyana 10k wani wishala mudalak labaganime pahasukam salasa thibima weyi.japanaya, amerikawa, engalanthaya wani ratawalwala mema sayibar aparadha mafiya kalliye kriyakarakam wishala washayen sidu weyi.me kalliye samajikayan atharin wadi pirisak ema ratawal walinma thoragath aparadhakaruwo wethi.me kalliya pilibandawa merata siyaluma bankuda danuwath kara atha.ee athara merata banku mema aparadha kalli walin aarakshawima sandaha suwisheshi aarakshaka widhiwidhanada yoda thibe.mema dawantha sayibar aparadha kalliya pilibandawa da niwyok tayims puwathpathada warthawak pala kara thibini..

di dharmasena kumaruwa 1983 mayi masa 17 wana dina thumbowila shri saddharmaramaya saha udapamunuwa banagethanna ubhaya wiharadhipathiwa wada wisu, malwathu parshwaye kolambaa salpiti koralaye dwithiya adhikarana sangha nayaka, waidyacharya padawigampola gunananda nahimiyange saha uuwa syamawanshika maha nikaye warthamana mahanayaka, aggamaha saddhammajothikadhaja, ambaewela panynyasara mahanayaka swamindrayan wahansege aacharyayathwayen prawrajya sampath laba pirunu wisiwayas athiwa kappetipola subhadrarama maha wiharastha mangaloposathagarayedi upasampadawa labuha.paliyagoda widyalankara maha piruwanata athulathwa sarwabhauma panditha mahacharya yakkaduwe shri pragnyarama nahimi, mahacharya naththandiye pragnyakara nahimi, aacharya walamitiyawe dharmarakshitha nahimi, prachina bhasha chakrawarthi rathkarawwe wimaladhamma nahimi, mahacharya bambaarande siri siwali nahimi, mahacharya kumbaurugamuwe wajira nahimi, aacharya walamitiyawe kusaladhamma nahimi, mahacharya thumbaulle silakkhandha nahimi aadi wiyath yathiwarayanan wahanselage pa sewanehi dharma shasthrodgrahanayehi niratha wuha.
